member.name: M:RecipeService.Controllers.RecipeController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a single recipe with the specified Id
member.param: The id of the recipe to return

member.name: M:RecipeService.Controllers.RecipeController.Post(RecipeService.ViewModels.RecipeModel)
member.summary: Creates a new recipe and returns the Id
member.returns: The id of the new recipe
